title: RedParts
description: A modern and fully responsive portfolio website to showcase skills, education, and projects with smooth animations.

title: EcoBazar
description: A clean and simple todo application where users can add, edit, and delete daily tasks with local storage support.

title: Donation
description: A weather app that provides real-time weather data and 5-day forecasts for any city using the OpenWeather API.

title: Medifit
description: A frontend e-commerce UI design featuring product listing, cart preview, and category-based filtering.

title: BookShelf
description: A simple blog platform where users can read, write, and manage posts with markdown support and Firebase authentication.
